item.title: Assignment 2
item.description: Upload your assignment to the Blackboard link for “Assignment 2” by February 16. Tasks Find the brief sketch of scientific method you wrote out during our exercise in class.1 Write that out briefly.2 (about 3–4 sentences) 2 .Look at the steps in, or parts of, your representation of scientific method. Do any of the moves involve deductive reasoning? Do any of the moves involve inductive reasoning? (By “moves” I mean: If someone were to try to do science using your method, what are the steps they would probably take?

item.title: Assignment 1
item.description: Upload your page to “Assignment 1” on Blackboard, under the Assignments area (link in the left sidebar) by, at the latest, (anytime on) February 9. Tasks For this exercise, arguments take the form of two or more sentences — with at least three usually making things easier! — the last of which is the conclusion. The phrases in each sentence should fit together. See (assigned reading) forallx, Chapter 2 for examples of arguments.
